snippet: An announcement nearly coinciding with the deportation of a Canadian missionary held in China on spy charges raises criticism by human rights advocates....
abstract: Canada agrees to negotiate bilateral extradition treaty with China, defying longstanding opposition over China's lack of due process and drawing outcry from human rights advocates; announcement comes day before Beijing deports Canadian missionary Kevin Garratt, event Prime Min Justin Trudeau says is unrelated to deal.
lead_paragraph: An announcement nearly coinciding with the deportation of a Canadian missionary held in China on spy charges raises criticism by human rights advocates.

headline.main: Canada Agrees to Talks on Extradition Treaty With China
headline.print_headline: Canada Agrees to Treaty Talks With China on Extradition

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
